sentences.sentence: The Marines, who watched the crawling column from their perches in the hills, wondered profanely why the vehicles had to be piled high with tent frames, wooden doors, and other luxuries of life.
sentences.translation: 在山巅上进行防御的陆战队员望着山下公路上蜿蜒蠕动的车队，很不理解为什么卡车上堆着高高的诸如帐篷框架、木门等这些奢侈的生活用具。
